response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. We are confident this offer presents a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
